title: Book Cover, "Bookjacket for "The Natural and the Supernatural Jew" by Arthur A. Cohen", 1962
medium: Lithograph on white shiny wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted on the cover, lower right in black ink: Jacket design by Elaine Lustig.
On the cover at the top center in black ink: The/Natural/and the/ Supernatural/ Jew
At center bottom: Arthur A. Cohen
At top left: An Historical and Theological Introduction
provenance: Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff; 1993: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: Book jacket for "The Natural and the Supernatural Jew" by Arthuer A. Cohen. A band of purple is placed in the upper half of the page, while the title and author are printed over this rectangle as well as the rest of the white page in black ink.

tombstone.epitaph: Book Cover, "Bookjacket for "The Natural and the Supernatural Jew" by Arthur A. Cohen", 1962. Lithograph on white shiny wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-54.
